title.rendered: Contour GEL Memory Foam Aero Pillow Small (11.5×19.5×3.7:2.7″)

content.rendered:
ERGONOMIC SHAPE: 

Rise & Shine’s Contour range of pillows are recommended for those who require a curative sleep posture. The special design of the pillow helps in supporting our head, neck & shoulder naturally to give us a perfect night sleep. This small size contour pillow is recommended for children and those adults who like to use thinner pillows.

 

MEMORY COMFORT® FOAM: 

Made up of imported materials these memory foam pillows bring you the most comfortable sleep. As the name suggests Memory foam has the ability to remember the original shape, it slowly returns back to it after being compressed. The pillow is made up of 100% pure Visco-elastic memory foam.

 

GEL MEMORY FOAM: 

Rise & Shine Gel Memory Pillows have GEL Infused technology to keep the pillow cool while using. It maintains the temperature of the pillow by releasing the excessive heat generated by the human body during the sleep.

 

AERO TECHNOLOGY: 

Sync into the aero comfort to allow your pillow have the maximum ventilation of air with the pin core technology so that the temperature of the pillow is regulated while you sleep. It helps reduce the heat and gives you a cooler experience. The Memory Foam pads have Pinholes to make the pillow breathable.

 

TEMPERATURE SENSITIVE MATERIAL: 

It allows our body heat to activate the molding process so that it gives us personalized fit. The climate control features also does not allow the pillow to become hard in winters.

 

SPECIAL FEATURES:

  • Neck & Shoulder pain relief
  • Air Flow Technology for Refreshing Sleep
  • Relief from Sleep problems
  • Retains original shape after each use, Unlike Polyfill/Cotton pillows our pillows will not sag.
  • Invented by “NASA”
  • Total Value for Money

 

INNER COVER: 

We provide our pillows with two layers of jersey. The basic being a soft material to protect the pillow.

 

PREMIUM OUTER COVER: 

We provide a Premium fabric as our Outer Cover for the Pillows. It is Antiallergenic, eco-friendly and Easy to Care. Do not hand wash or use machine, only Spot clean by hand with warm water and mild detergent.

 

WE ASSURE: 

Our Pillows are made up of 100% filler-free foam. We have tested our pillows in lab and have a strict quality check before it is dispatched. Our pillows are of high density foam so be assured that it will be your companion for long. We provide One year limited warranty. Please check our Warranty section.

 

Our Pillows will be tightly rolled packed, kindly cut the plastic carefully and then enjoy your pillow coming back to its original shape within 24-48 Hours. Memory Foam pillows may contain air bubbles which may seem as if foam has holes but they are part of moulded foam and they do not affect the quality of the pillow.

excerpt.rendered: Sleeping with neck pain is very frustrating while no pain killers and ointments are of any help, Rise & Shine’s Aero GEL Memory Foam pillows are the perfect choice for you. Contour Pillows are also called cervical pillows as the cervical spine and lumbar spine will be gripped in the perfect position so it does not move unnaturally. The pillow takes the shape of your Head, neck and shoulder giving you the perfect support needed. GEL Memory foam pillow prevents your neck from bending, it allows your spine to remain aligned.
